00124 /* Hashtable used to cache the hostname, accessed by their IP addess */
00125 hash_table_t            * ht_ip_name ; 
00126 extern nfs_parameter_t    nfs_param ;
00127 unsigned int              expiration_time ;
00128 
00129 
00130 
00146 unsigned long int ip_name_value_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00147 {
00148   return (unsigned long int)(buffclef->pdata) % p_hparam->index_size ;
00149 } /*  ip_name_value_hash_func */
00150 
00151 
00168 unsigned long int ip_name_rbt_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef ) 
00169 {
00170   /* We use the Xid as the rbt value */
00171   return (unsigned long int)(buffclef->pdata) ;
00172 } /* ip_name_rbt_hash_func */
00173 
00187 int compare_ip_name(  hash_buffer_t * buff1, hash_buffer_t * buff2 )
00188 {
00189   unsigned long int xid1 = (unsigned long int)(buff1->pdata) ;
00190   unsigned long int xid2 = (unsigned long int)(buff2->pdata) ;
00191   return (xid1 == xid2)?0:1 ;
00192 } /* compare_xid */
00193 
00194 
00208 int display_ip_name( hash_buffer_t * pbuff, char * str ) 
00209 {
00210   unsigned long int ip_name  = ntohl( (unsigned long int)(pbuff->pdata) ) ;
00211   
00212   return sprintf( str, "%x : %d.%d.%d.%d", 
00213                   ip_name, 
00214                   ( ip_name & 0xFF000000 ) >> 24, 
00215                   ( ip_name & 0x00FF0000 ) >> 16,
00216                   ( ip_name & 0x0000FF00 ) >> 8,
00217                   ( ip_name & 0x000000FF ) ) ;
00218 } /* display_ip_name */
00219 
00220 int display_ip_value( hash_buffer_t * pbuff, char * str )
00221 {
00222   nfs_ip_name_t  * pnfs_ip_name ;
00223 
00224   pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)(pbuff->pdata) ;
00225 
00226 
00227   return sprintf( str, "%s", pnfs_ip_name->hostname ) ;
00228 } /* display_ip_name */

00233 
00249 int nfs_ip_name_add( unsigned        int ipaddr,
00250                      char          * hostname  )
00251 {
00252   hash_buffer_t       buffkey  ;
00253   hash_buffer_t       buffdata ;
00254   nfs_ip_name_t     * pnfs_ip_name  = NULL ;
00255   struct hostent    * hp ;
00256   unsigned long int   local_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00257   int                 length = sizeof( local_ipaddr ) ;
00258   
00259 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00260   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00261   BuddySetDebugLabel( "nfs_ip_name_t" ) ;
00262 #endif
00263 
00264   pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( nfs_ip_name_t ) ) ;
00265 
00266 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00267   /* For debugging memory leaks */
00268   BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00269 #endif
00270 
00271 
00272   if( pnfs_ip_name == NULL ) 
00273     return IP_NAME_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00274   
00275   /* I have to keep an integer as key, I wil use the pointer buffkey->pdata for this, 
00276    * this also means that buffkey->len will be 0 */
00277   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_ipaddr ; 
00278   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00279 
00280   /* Ask for the name to be cached */
00281   if( ( hp = gethostbyaddr( (char *)&local_ipaddr, length, AF_INET ) ) == NULL )
00282     {
00283       Mem_Free( (void *)pnfs_ip_name ) ;
00284       return IP_NAME_NETDB_ERROR ;
00285     }
00286   
00287 
00288   /* I build the data with the request pointer that should be in state 'IN USE' */
00289   pnfs_ip_name->ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00290   strncpy( pnfs_ip_name->hostname, hp->h_name, MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00291   pnfs_ip_name->timestamp = time( NULL ) ;
00292   
00293   buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)pnfs_ip_name ;
00294   buffdata.len = sizeof( nfs_ip_name_t ) ;
00295   
00296   if( HashTable_Set( ht_ip_name, &buffkey, &buffdata ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00297     return IP_NAME_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00298   
00299   /* Copy the value for the caller */
00300   strncpy( hostname, pnfs_ip_name->hostname, MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00301   
00302   
00303   return IP_NAME_SUCCESS ; 
00304 } /* nfs_ip_name_add */
00305 
00318 int  nfs_ip_name_get( unsigned int ipaddr, char * hostname )
00319 {
00320   hash_buffer_t        buffkey ;
00321   hash_buffer_t        buffval ;
00322   int                  status ;
00323   nfs_ip_name_t      * pnfs_ip_name ;
00324   unsigned long int    local_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00325   
00326   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_ipaddr ;
00327   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00328   
00329   if( HashTable_Get( ht_ip_name, &buffkey, &buffval ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00330     {
00331       pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)buffval.pdata ;
00332       strncpy( hostname, pnfs_ip_name->hostname, MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00333 
00334       status = IP_NAME_SUCCESS ;
00335     }
00336   else
00337     {
00338       status = IP_NAME_NOT_FOUND ;
00339     }
00340   return status ;
00341 } /* nfs_ip_name_get */
00342

00344 
00356 int nfs_ip_name_remove( int ipaddr )
00357 {
00358   hash_buffer_t        buffkey , old_value ;
00359   int                  status = IP_NAME_SUCCESS;
00360   hash_data_t        * pdata = NULL ;
00361   nfs_ip_name_t      * pnfs_ip_name  = NULL ;
00362   unsigned long int    local_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00363 
00364   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_ipaddr ; 
00365   buffkey.len = 0 ;
00366 
00367    if( HashTable_Del( ht_ip_name, &buffkey, NULL, &old_value ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00368     {
00369       pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)old_value.pdata ;
00370       Mem_Free( (void *)pnfs_ip_name ) ;
00371     }
00372   else
00373     {
00374       status = IP_NAME_NOT_FOUND ;
00375     }
00376 
00377    return status ;
00378 } /* nfs_ip_name_remove */

00381 
00393 int nfs_Init_ip_name( nfs_ip_name_parameter_t  param ) 
00394 { 
00395   if( ( ht_ip_name = HashTable_Init( param.hash_param  ) ) == NULL )
00396     {
00397       DisplayLog( "NFS IP_NAME: Cannot init IP/name cache" ) ;
00398       return -1 ;
00399     }
00400 
00401   /* Set the expiration time */
00402   expiration_time = param.expiration_time ;
00403 
00404   return IP_NAME_SUCCESS;
00405 } /* nfs_Init_ip_name */
00406 
00407 
00408 int nfs_ip_name_populate( char * path  )
00409 {
00410   config_file_t       config_file ;
00411   int                 blk_index ;
00412   int                 var_max ;
00413   int                 var_index ;
00414   int                 err ;
00415   char              * key_name ;
00416   char              * key_value ;
00417   char                label[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00418   int                 rc ;
00419   unsigned int        ipaddr ;
00420   unsigned long int   long_ipaddr ;
00421   nfs_ip_name_t     * pnfs_ip_name ; 
00422   hash_buffer_t       buffkey ;
00423   hash_buffer_t       buffdata ;
00424 
00425 
00426 
00427   config_file = config_ParseFile( path );
00428 
00429   if( !config_file )
00430    {
00431      DisplayLog( "Can't open file %s", path ) ;
00432 
00433      return IP_NAME_NOT_FOUND ;
00434    }
00435 
00436    /* Get the config BLOCK */
00437   if( ( blk_index = config_GetBlockIndexByName( config_file, CONF_LABEL_IP_NAME_HOSTS ) ) < 0 )
00438     {
00439       DisplayLog( "Can't get label %s in file %s", CONF_LABEL_IP_NAME_HOSTS, path ) ;
00440       return IP_NAME_NOT_FOUND ;
00441     }
00442 
00443   var_max = config_GetNbKeys( config_file, blk_index ) ;
00444 
00445   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00446     {
00447       /* Get key's name */
00448       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( config_file,
00449                                       blk_index,
00450                                       var_index,
00451                                       &key_name,
00452                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00453         {
00454           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00455                   var_index, label ) ;
00456           return ID_MAPPER_NOT_FOUND ;
00457         }
00458 
00459       ipaddr = inet_addr( key_value ) ;
00460       long_ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00461 
00462 
00463       /* Entry to be cached */
00464       if( ( pnfs_ip_name = (nfs_ip_name_t *)Mem_Alloc( sizeof( nfs_ip_name_t ) ) ) == NULL )
00465           return ID_MAPPER_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00466 
00467       /* I build the data with the request pointer that should be in state 'IN USE' */
00468       pnfs_ip_name->ipaddr = ipaddr ;
00469       strncpy( pnfs_ip_name->hostname, key_name, MAXHOSTNAMELEN ) ;
00470       pnfs_ip_name->timestamp = time( NULL ) ;
00471 
00472       buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)pnfs_ip_name ;
00473       buffdata.len = sizeof( nfs_ip_name_t ) ;
00474 
00475       /* I have to keep an integer as key, I wil use the pointer buffkey->pdata for this,
00476        * this also means that buffkey->len will be 0 */
00477       buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)long_ipaddr ;
00478 
00479       buffkey.len = 0 ;
00480 
00481 
00482       if( HashTable_Set( ht_ip_name, &buffkey, &buffdata ) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00483         return IP_NAME_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00484 
00485     }
00486 
00487   /* HashTable_Print( ht_ip_name ) ;*/
00488   return IP_NAME_SUCCESS ;
00489 } /* nfs_ip_name_populate */

00505 void nfs_ip_name_get_stats(  hash_stat_t * phstat )
00506 {
00507   HashTable_GetStats( ht_ip_name, phstat ) ;
00508 } /* nfs_ip_name_get_stats */
